item.title: There Should Be More Mergers
item.description: When people talk about M&A, it is usually in reference to an acquisition. Mergers should be considered more frequently.

item.title: "How Do You Know?"
item.description: An important lesson from Y Combinator’s Startup School

item.title: How I Use Streaming Services
item.description: The rise of Netflix naturally led to competitors in the media space wanting a piece of the action. Netflix deals started to wane and they found themselves with no choice but to commission original content. What does the future of media streaming look like?

item.title: You Can't Top Bitcoin
item.description: Bitcoin has endured over a decade, and contenders are constantly being deployed. Why is it the best cryptocurrency? Here I review cash, gold, mobile, and other decentralized platforms and how they compare with Bitcoin.

item.title: Grocery & Meal Delivery
item.description: Why Don’t Grocery Delivery Services Have Inventory?

item.title: Hyperloop May Create New Cities
item.description: City Planning and Real Estate Markets May Become Vastly Different If Hyperloop Succeeds
